service.name: XigniteCurrencies
service.description: Provide real-time currency foreign exchange information and calculations.

method.name: ListCurrencies
method.description: List supported currencies.

method.name: ListActiveCurrencies
method.description: List supported currencies.

method.name: ListOfficialRates
method.description: List supported official rates.

method.name: GetUnitOfAccount
method.description: Get Unit Of Account.

method.name: ConvertRealTimeValue
method.description: Convert value from one currency to another in real-time.

method.name: ConvertHistoricalValue
method.description: Convert value from one currency to another as of a historical date.

method.name: GetRealTimeForwardRate
method.description: Returns a set of real-time currency forward rates.

method.name: GetRealTimeCrossRateAsString
method.description: Returns a real-time currency cross-rate.

method.name: GetLatestCrossRate
method.description: Returns the latest possible cross rate.

method.name: GetLatestCrossRates
method.description: Returns the latest possible cross rate.

method.name: GetRealTimeCrossRate
method.description: Returns a real-time currency cross-rate.

method.name: GetRealTimeCrossRateGMT
method.description: Returns a real-time currency cross-rate with the times in GMT.

method.name: GetRawCrossRate
method.description: Returns a real-time currency cross-rate.

method.name: GetRawCrossRates
method.description: Returns a real-time currency cross-rate.

method.name: GetRealTimeCrossRates
method.description: Returns the latest possible cross rate.

method.name: GetHistoricalCrossRateTables
method.description: Returns historical currency cross-rate tables for a range of dates.

method.name: GetHistoricalCrossRateTablesBidAsk
method.description: Returns historical currency cross-rate tables for a range of dates.

method.name: GetCurrencyReport
method.description: Returns historical currency cross-rate tables for a range of dates.

method.name: GetHistoricalCrossRateTable
method.description: Returns a historical currency cross-rate table.

method.name: GetHistoricalCrossRateTableBidAsk
method.description: Returns a historical currency cross-rate table.

method.name: GetRealTimeCrossRateTable
method.description: Returns a real-time currency cross-rate table.

method.name: GetRealTimeCrossRateTableWithBidAsk
method.description: Returns a real-time currency cross-rate table.

method.name: GetAllCrossRatesForACurrency
method.description: Returns all valid cross rates for a currency.

method.name: GetRealTimeCrossRateTableAsHTML
method.description: Returns a real-time currency cross-rate table as an HTML Output.

method.name: GetSimpleRealTimeCrossRateTableAsHTML
method.description: Returns a real-time currency cross-rate table as an HTML Output.

method.name: GetHistoricalCrossRateTableAsHTML
method.description: Returns a historical currency cross-rate table as an HTML Output.

method.name: GetHistoricalCrossRate
method.description: Returns a cross-rate as of a historical date.

method.name: GetHistoricalCrossRates
method.description: Returns multiple cross-rates as of a historical date.

method.name: GetHistoricalCrossRateBidAsk
method.description: Returns a cross-rate with bid/ask as of a historical date.

method.name: GetHistoricalCrossRatesBidAsk
method.description: Returns multiple cross-rates with bid/ask as of a historical date.

method.name: GetHistoricalCrossRatesRange
method.description: This operation returns a range of cross-rates for a currency pair.

method.name: GetHistoricalCrossRatesBidAskRange
method.description: This operation returns a range of cross-rates for a currency pair.

method.name: GetHistoricalCrossRatesAsOf
method.description: This operation returns a range of cross-rates for a currency pair.

method.name: GetHistoricalCrossRatesBidAskAsOf
method.description: This operation returns a range of cross-rates for a currency pair.

method.name: GetOfficialCrossRate
method.description: Returns an official cross-rate as of a historical date.

method.name: GetOfficialCrossRates
method.description: Returns an official cross-rate as of a historical date.

method.name: GetOfficialCrossRateBidAsk
method.description: Returns an official cross-rate as of a historical date.

method.name: GetOfficialCrossRatesBidAsk
method.description: Returns an official cross-rate as of a historical date.

method.name: GetMutipleHistoricalCrossRates
method.description: Returns multiple cross-rates as of a historical date.

method.name: GetAverageHistoricalCrossRates
method.description: This operation returns an array average daily historical cross-rates for a period.

method.name: GetAverageHistoricalCrossRate
method.description: This operation returns an average daily historical cross-rates for a period.

method.name: GetHistoricalMonthlyCrossRatesRange
method.description: This operation returns a complete range of stock quotes for a currency pair.

method.name: GetCrossRateChange
method.description: This operation returns the changes in a cross-rates over the last 6 months.

method.name: GetCurrencyChartCustom
method.description: Draw a custom currency chart for a date range.

method.name: GetCurrencyChartCustomBinary
method.description: Draw a custom currency chart for a date range.

method.name: GetCurrencyChart
method.description: Draw a historical currency chart for a date range.

method.name: GetCurrencyChartBinary
method.description: Draw a historical currency chart for a date range in binary format.

method.name: GetCurrencyIntradayChart
method.description: Draw a intraday currency chart for a time range

method.name: GetCurrencyIntradayChartCustomBinary
method.description: Draw a intraday currency chart for a time range in a binary format

method.name: GetCurrencyIntradayChartCustom
method.description: Draw a intraday currency chart for a time range in a binary format

method.name: GetChartDesign
method.description: Returns the default design class for the currency Chart.

method.name: GetTick
method.description: Returns a tick for a currency pair as of a specific time in the day.

method.name: GetTicks
method.description: Returns a range of ticks for a currency pair.

method.name: GetHistoricalTicks
method.description: Returns a range of ticks for a currency pair.

method.name: GetHistoricalHighLow
method.description: Returns the high and the low ticks for a historical time range.

method.name: GetIntradayHighLow
method.description: Returns the high and the low ticks for today.
